summary: A sarcastic near-sighted cartoonist, averse to commitment, falls for an eye-catching brunette, a single mother of three and the only woman who can stand his strong anti-feminist opinions, and eventually proposes and moves in with her.
cast: Jack Lemmon|Barbara Harris|Jason Robards|Herb Edelman|Lisa Gerritsen|Moosie Drier|Severn Darden|Lisa Eilbacher|Lucille Meredith|Ruth McDevitt|Joey Faye|Alan DeWitt|John Zaremba|Richard Gates|Lea Marmer|Janya Braunt|Olive Dunbar|Margaret Muse|Bill Hickman|Joyce Brothers|Leigh Adams-Bennett|Jane Adrian|Shirley Anthony|Danny Arnold|Frank Baker|Tony Dante|Bob Harks|Lars Hensen|Robert Hitchcock|George Holmes|Kathryn Janssen|Anthony Redondo|Burt Richards|Leoda Richards|Clark Ross|Jeffrey Sayre|Walter Smith|Norman Stevans|Arthur Tovey|Chalky Williams

title: Guerra entre hombres y mujeres
